column5: After my brother calling me 1000 times every night. begging me to bring him fishing  I finaly found time to get out and enjoi yesterdays weather.  sunny. lil winds. PERFECT!  so i pack all my gear after work and head out to pick up my brother at school.  we get to the fallz @ around 5 pm.  i hook him up with a crank bait and he lands hes first pike of the year!    unhook the snake and he continues casting.  GOT EM!...  a BEAST OOS smallie JUMPS all over the place.  unhook that beast and gentaly let him go in the current.  @ this point the bite was getting slow so he decides to hook up the OLD WORM ON A HOOK AND SINKER.  not 5 minutes goes by and the lines got a nibble.  FISH ON BABY!.    BARBUE!!!!!!  SLINGS the worm at the exact same spot....  SA MORT TU????  GOT EM! he yellz.......       CHEVALIER BLANC/ROUGE????????????????????????????  Nice catch bro!!!  but thats not all hes got another trick up his sleeve.    FALL FISH! a chumb for crying out loud....  this kid is a multi-species-fisher-master!  Congrats on the nice fish jason.  till next time!   24/7
crazy multi-species action!!  With a brother like that..... Oh, and, Wind from the north, you gotta troll back and forth!
that sucker has massive fins...i bet they give a hell of a fight!
i dont know ask my bro he is the MASTA!
Great report and pics Kevin I know where that spot is Looks like your brother has the magic touch    Congratulations Jason Great job and thanks for sharing Jacques
